channel.title: Client error
channel.description: Just downloaded a 525 server and client to try it out. Never really coded one before and don't get the gist of it yet. But for some reason.. Wehn I start up my client, I get this error. [code]error_game_js5crc[/code] Why?

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

I’ve ran the server first, then the client and it’ll load up (Sometimes!) but then says

No response from server...

Blah Blah

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Normally means that you need to run the server first, before the client, or you don’t have the correct cache, or it’s just placed in the wrong location.

Read full topic

item.title: Client error
item.dc:creator: @Ebowne24 Ebowne24
item.description:
@Ebowne24 wrote:

Just downloaded a 525 server and client to try it out.
Never really coded one before and don’t get the gist of it yet.
But for some reason… Wehn I start up my client, I get this error.

error_game_js5crc

Why?

Read full topic
